source.name: Largest Unrecoverable Data Loss Incidents of All Time
source.description: A list of the largest (in volume) unintentional confirmed data loss incidents of all time.  Unlike other lists which target data "spills" (e.g. credit card numbers), this list tracks the largest unrecoverable data losses incurred throughout history.
